attributes.action: create an independent body to govern, manage and otherwise administer the taxpayers' stake in UK banks.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Prime Minister,

Devolving the power to set interest rates to an independent monetary policy committee was one of your finest moments.

Please don't spoil it by allowing politics to determine how our stake in the high street banks is managed.

Yours, the undersigned.
